screen.title: Main JNode Build Settings
screen.item: The JNode build can generate configuration files for running on a hardware emulation / virtualization platform.
Specify any custom Java compilation arguments; run "javac -help" and "javac -X" for details.
A number of JNode build settings are only of interest to experts.

screen.title: Virtualization Platform Settings
screen.item: Specify the memory size for the virtual PC; at least 512 Mbytes is recommended.
Select a disk image to be mounted as a virtual hard drive.

screen.title: Expert Mode Build Settings
screen.item: You can specify a directory containing plugin lists for custom initjars. The path can include Ant variables; e.g. "${root.dir}/my/plugin-lists/"
Select the memory manager / garbage collector: 'def' is the default memory manager, 'mmtk.nogc' is a MMTk NoGC memory manager (beta), and 'mmtk.genrc' is a MMTk GenRC memory manager (alpha).
Select a remote debugger host. This is used by the Ant 'hotswap' task. Use "none" if you don't need to enable remote debugging.
